Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory266.png'}
{1: 'Spaceport'}
{3: 'It appears like she has been waiting here for some time. As you draw near, the pink-haired Construct waves at you gently.'}
{2: 'So, where are we going?', 3: '9'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "We're heading to... Constellia.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Constellia?', 3: '11', 4: "If we're going down, I need approval...", 5: '11'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Don't worry. I've already filed a mission request for you as the vice-captain of the Engineering Force... Celica gave it the green light right away.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'However, just taking a walk around Constellia isn\'t the "sincerity" I had in mind. Think of it as... an appetizer.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Then what do you want...', 3: '15'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Join me for the stress test with the new transport crew at Constellia.', 4: '1'}
{2: "...That's it?", 3: '17', 4: "That's all you want?", 5: '17'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Now I'm feeling unsatisfied, like my bargain deal was accepted too easily.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She squints her eyes at you.'}
{2: 'I think we should just leave it like this.', 3: '28', 4: 'How about I treat you to a cherry-flavored electrolyte?', 5: '25'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Eh, you actually remember that...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Your memory is really something else...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "It's a deal, then.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'This all started with your wild squad member, after all, setting up a defensive countermeasure program like that in the whitelist...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'A day of your time as compensation for a day of my workload—sounds like a fair trade.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Here. This is our schedule for today.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She brings up the terminal, revealing a lengthy list of scheduled activities.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "First up, we'll take a look around Constellia. Those mechanoids always hide some gems from the Golden Age.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "This place, that place, and this one too... After we're done, we'll join the stress test for the new transport crew.", 4: '1'}
{2: '...This schedule is jam-packed. Can we really finish it?', 3: '40', 4: 'Alright.', 5: '42'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I've planned it down to the last detail, so there won't be any problems.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Surprisingly agreeable, aren't you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "...The transport craft's here. Let's go.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'First stop—Constellia!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory671.jpg'}
{1: 'Constellia'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The intricate mechanoid city always gives the impression that you could easily lose your way in its twisting streets and alleys, regardless of how many times you traverse them.'}
{3: "However, Teddy effortlessly guides you through a series of twists and turns into an unmarked path on the map, as if she's simply navigating through the Engineering Force."}
{2: 'How do you guys find these routes...?', 3: '56'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'We technicians have our own ways, you know.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Want to learn it? Shell out the tuition, and I'll squeeze in some teaching when I can.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Teddy abruptly halts in her tracks. Following her gaze, you catch sight of none other than the long-unseen eldest son of the Norman family.'}
{3: 'She quickly pulls you behind a surprisingly tall trash can built for some unknown reason.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: '...What brings him here?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Why does he have all this free time... Did Victoria not load him up with enough work?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Didn't you two make up already?", 3: '73'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Who are you talking about? Clearly not me.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Even though she manages to hide in time, Leonardo appears to have sensed something strange and begins walking in your direction.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I can't get stuck with him, or he'll definitely start spouting nonsense, and our plans for today will be ruined.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After glancing around, Teddy suddenly gives you a hard push.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Please... Keep him occupied!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With a playful wink, she slips into a nearby shop.'}
{3: 'Before you can regain your composure, Leonardo has already approached you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leonardo', 3: '...Hmm? Gray Raven Commandant? I think I saw... Teddy just now?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: 'Are you on a surface mission with her?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: 'Is my dear sister hiding from me...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "If that's the case, big brother might get a bit hurt!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: 'Is she really not around?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wh-what are you doing here in Constellia?', 3: '97'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: 'Oh, just some boring stuff. Victoria roped me into assisting with the reconstruction in Constellia, so here I am, checking it out against my will.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "Handling mechanoids really isn't as interesting as dealing with those sly old foxes in Parliament.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After finding no sign of Teddy and having some pointless chatter with you, Leonardo leaves with an expression that says, "This person is no fun."'}
{3: "Though you haven't interacted with him much, you are surprised to notice that he appears more at ease than before."}
{3: 'As you watch him walk away, you turn around, your attention caught by a line of dazzling shops. However, you have already forgotten which one Teddy slipped into...'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Shh, over here.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Tracing her voice around the corner, you quickly spot Teddy in an entirely different coating, peering out from the back door of a shop.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Did he really leave?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'He really left.', 3: '109'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Good... Hey, why are you staring at me? Haven't you seen my new coating?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'This design is inspired by the Golden Age aesthetic.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I've been itching to put together something like this since I left Gestalt, and I have to say, it turned out pretty well.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Why the sudden change in the coating?', 3: '117'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Obviously, I don't want Leonardo to latch onto me. He's never seen this coating.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'In this getup, even if he accidentally catches a glimpse of me, I can easily fade into the crowd and avoid being found.', 4: '1'}
{2: '...Are you sure?', 3: '121', 4: 'Sounds like a good plan.', 5: '124'}
{3: 'She responds uncertainly, appearing to be unsure herself.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Speaking of which, how about you... get changed too?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Me?', 3: '128', 4: 'Get changed into what?', 5: '127'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "New clothes, obviously! What do you think? There's a mechanoid-run clothing store right around the corner.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I don't have time to whip up a custom design for you, but I can definitely help you pick something out right now!", 4: '1'}
{2: "But doesn't that quirky collector only show up at certain times?", 3: '133'}
{2: "By the way, doesn't that quirky collector only show up at certain times?", 3: '133'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "Hmph, you just don't want new clothes...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After considering it, the pink-haired Construct finally decides to abandon the idea of having you change.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Alright, I'll let you off the hook this time, just for the sake of my new headphones.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Let me think about where to go next...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Right, it's this way.", 4: '1'}
